"Xiera":
"ザンバースについて
説明します！"

"ザンバースは風属性のテクニックで
設置した範囲内で攻撃すると
風属性の追撃が発生します。 "

"それでは、ザンバースを設置して
風属性の追撃を発生させてみましょう。"

"・Cast Zanverse with <%PhotonArts>
・Use a normal attack with <%NormalAttack> and see the second wind-based hit"

"・Cast Zanverse with <%PhotonArts>
・Use a normal attack with <%NormalAttack> and see the second wind-based hit"

"Zanverse is a Wind-attribute Technique that adds a second Wind-based hit to all attacks within its range.

The effect remains in place for a short time after the initial cast, and you can benefit from it by entering its area of effect as long as it is active.

This effect applies to all allies."
